column4: I assume your browser on the same system is working due to proxy?
No, i´m not using a proxy
when you say you don't have cli access to internet, does that mean that wget a page fails?  maybe just port 80 works on your isp?
ping is not port 80 and most windows systems mask ping
again ping is not port 80,  what about wget ?
I can´t install packages, doesn´t that include port 80?
Wait, what? :| wget on google works... mind=fucked
my work also filtered only let out and in on port 80
But, i could install packages yesterday.. and at my other ubuntu box...
you can setup your home system to have ssh open on port 80 then you can connect to that and access the world from work
that's what we did to watch porn from work
no.. it´s weird, i couldn´t install packages a couple of minutes ago, now i can..
well packages can still be installed on port 80 so take out the repository that don't us port 80
